props.name: active
props.description: Defines a tab as the current display tab

props.name: fixedDrawer
props.description: Makes the drawer always visible and open in larger screens

props.name: fixedHeader
props.description: Makes the header always visible, even in small screens

props.name: noDrawerButton
props.description: Does not display a drawer button

props.name: noDesktopDrawerButton
props.description: Does not display a drawer button in desktop mode

props.name: largeScreenOnly
props.description: Hides an element on smaller screens

props.name: smallScreenOnly
props.description: Hides an element on larger screens

props.name: fixedTabs
props.description: Uses fixed tabs instead of the default scrollable tabs

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the layout content and can contain HTML
